xcanps_sinit.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the XCanPs driver's static initialization functionality.

Note:
None.


 MODIFICATION HISTORY:


 Ver   Who    Date	Changes
 ----- -----  -------- -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a xd/sv  01/12/10 First release


 
 


#include "xparameters.h"

#include "xcanps.h"







Functions


XCanPs_Config * XCanPs_LookupConfig (u16 DeviceId)




Variables


XCanPs_Config XCanPs_ConfigTable []





Function Documentation





  

    
      

        

          XCanPs_Config* XCanPs_LookupConfig           
          ( 
          u16 
           DeviceId          
           ) 
          
        

      

    		
  





  

    
       
    
    



This function looks for the device configuration based on the unique device ID. The table XCanPs_ConfigTable[] contains the configuration information for each device in the system.


Parameters:

  

    
DeviceId is the unique device ID of the device being looked up.

  




Returns:
A pointer to the configuration table entry corresponding to the given device ID, or NULL if no match is found.


Note:
None. 

    		
  




Variable Documentation





  

    
      

        

          XCanPs_Config XCanPs_ConfigTable[]          
        

      

    		
  





  

    
       
    
    



This table contains configuration information for each CAN device in the system.
